website_summaries.verdict: These rotors from a top company are designed to provide excellent braking.
pros: These rotors feature an advanced technology metallurgy that offers long-lasting durability
Easy to install onto the wheel hub
cons: The rotors show surface rust very quickly

customer_reviews.title: Fixed what was ailing me
customer_reviews.text: Was having a terrible wobble and vibration in the braking system. I decided to spend the money and see if this was the cause. I was skeptical since I only had 40K on the vehicle, but they were the cure. Hard to spend money to have the rotors machined when you can get brand new for similar price.
customer_reviews.author: Zune Goon

customer_reviews.title: Top quality alternative to some import junk.
customer_reviews.text: Received item individually packed and wrapped in a heavy plastic bag. Not a speck of rust anywhere. Rotor surface was machined very nicely. I did not have a lathe to put these on to check for true, but I did use a caliper around the outer edge and these are extremely flat. Installed on a Ford Fusion with 55,000 miles. Complete brake job as its faster, easier and an upgrade to just pad replacement and/or turning the factory rotors. A Ford tech I spoke with said at 55,000 miles I could probably get them turned and get another 30,000 if I was lucky...so to the scrapyard went the OEMs. I'll try to update in 3 years on how they're wearing.
customer_reviews.author: J. R.

customer_reviews.title: Valuable Choice
customer_reviews.text: For half the price of a local auto parts store, can't beat it. They are possibly reconditioned but of quality standards.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Paul

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Put these on my 2008 Ford Fusion SE, they went on very easily! Look great and no issues so far, I will update in a few weeks/months.
customer_reviews.author: $Terrill J$

customer_reviews.title: Good rotors, very quiet
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, super quiet and a whole lot better than what came in my car. Installed on 2011 Fusion awd
customer_reviews.author: Evan Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Decent rotor
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daily driver to replace a rotor that had warped. No fuss and no issues. Surface rusty started right away but that’s not an issue for me.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, made a world of difference in braking. Very pleased with the quality of these rotors.
customer_reviews.author: John Santana

customer_reviews.title: Good value rotor for Ford Fusion.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent rotor fit my 2012 Ford Fusion SE perfectly. No issues installing and they are free from vibration and chatter. Braking is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Stein

customer_reviews.title: They do their job
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my 2010 Fusion. Installed perfectly and is much improved over the worn OEM rotors, duh. I'd certainly buy them again if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Fit without problems on my Mazda 6 '06. It does get covered with rust rather fast after rains - but I don't think there are rotors that don't do that.
customer_reviews.author: RF=GOAT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Rotors at an Excellent Value
customer_reviews.text: These rotors are a great factory replacement. They are solid and much higher quality that then OEM ones. This should be the last set of rotors this car will ever need. Will purchase and use on all of my other cars and trucs.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My old rotors were warped, these new ones fixed the problem,
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I hope they live up to their name
customer_reviews.text: Only had them on a few weeks but they seem to be doing very well
customer_reviews.author: Steve young

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality rotors and perfect fit for my 2009 Mazda 6. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit nice rotor!
customer_reviews.text: Fit on my Ford Fusion like a glove. Screw holes matched perfectly. Does get rust on the edge fairly quick but that's to be expected in winter with salty snowy roads. Throw a little grease behind it when installing should you have to replace it it'll come off easier.
customer_reviews.author: CheezBizkut

customer_reviews.title: Discs feel as they are good quality. 3K driven on them and they grab ...
customer_reviews.text: Discs feel as they are good quality. 3K driven on them and they grab better than OEM. Did not feel any problems for the break in period. They do not rust as others after rain. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Azem Elezovic

product_meta.title: Raybestos 680404R Professional Grade Disc Brake Rotor
product_meta.description:
Raybestos is world-renowned in the automotive aftermarket as a leading manufacturer of brake parts. Products includes friction, rotors, drums, calipers, hub assemblies and hydraulics, matches or exceeds OE form, fit and function. Each product is extensively tested to ensure you are receiving a high-quality and reliable product.

AMAZON.COM


Raybestos Disc Brake Rotors are designed to provide excellent braking. These rotors feature an advanced technology metallurgy which offers long lasting durability. They are fitted on to the wheel hub and provide brilliant vehicle stability. They are corrosion resistant and ensure easy installation. 

CHOOSE THE RAYBESTOS ROTOR THAT'S RIGHT FOR YOU
Regardless of the make and model of your vehicle, you have several options while selecting Raybestos rotors. Use the guide below to better understand which Raybestos rotor is right for your vehicle. All Raybestos rotors feature SAE-compliant standards for strength and durability, with tight lateral runouts and minimal thickness variation, so you know regardless of the rotor you choose that you're getting a consistent, predictable, and safe product.

>  Raybestos Professional Grade--This full-coverage rotor provides the most complete application-specific line of rotors on the market, covering 99.8% of import and domestic cars, light trucks, and SUVs. The non-directional ground finish means it's ready to install right out of the box. Professional Grade is ideal for everyday driving situations, and includes many problem solver applications. Professional Grade is also available in Police and Medium Duty applications.


Raybestos Advanced Technology--Provides the best noise solution that meets or exceeds OE expectations to deliver best-in-class performance and durability. Black fusion coating gives a clean, finished look,, while the application-specific iron suppresses noise and keeps brakes running cool. The turned finish minimizes noise and improves responsiveness, and is installation-ready right out of the box. Advanced Technology is ideal for sever duty, fleet, enthusiast, and high-performance vehicles.


Raybestos R-300--The ultimate upgrade, the R-300 series features an S-Groove slot design that maximizes pad-to-rotor contact for stronger bite, smoother braking, and increased pad life. Black fusion coating gives a clean, finished look, while the grey fusion coating can withstand 300 hours of saltwater exposure and reduces rust for optimal airflow and cooling. Non-directional rotation means it can be used on all four corners of the vehicle. R-300 is designed for high-performance vehicles, work trucks, fleets, and family vehicles with towing capabilities.
feature_bullets: Raybestos is world-renowned in the automotive aftermarket as a leading manufacturer of brake parts
Products includes friction, rotors, drums, calipers, hub assemblies and hydraulics, matches or exceeds OE form, fit and function
Each product is extensively tested to ensure you are receiving a high-quality and reliable product
